section.p: The ship’s captain says, ‘I’ll take you to Dweomer, on the Sorcerer’s Isle but it’s a dangerous place. You’d better be sure you can handle it - if you’re not at least a Master of your profession, I’d advise against it. It’s up to you though.’

You must have Over the Blood-Dark Sea to travel to Sorcerer’s Isle.
If you want to go,
cross off the 30 Shards and turn to 26
.
Otherwise, return to the section you came from.
